column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hello Moira - Thank you for your review. It has never been our intention to "hype" our restaurant. More than four years ago we sought to introduce something new and enjoyable to Houston since at that time there were not so many dedicated ramen shops in our city. Today
column3: there are many more options for ramen
column4: and we strongly believe there's plenty of room in Space City for everyone. We'll never be all things to all people
column6: and we do our best to provide a quality product. Thank you for giving us a try
column7: and we wish you the best.
